name: International Nursing Science Conference
content: Magnus Group warmly invites you to its foremost event “International Nursing Science Conference”(Nursing Science 2023) which will be aimed from August 21-23, 2023 at London, UK and virtually. Nursing Conferences 2023 | Nursing Science Congress | Nurse Conferences | Nursing Conferences | Nursing Conference | Nursing Science Conference | Nursing Congress | Nursing Research Conferences | Nursing Research Conference | Nurse Conference Reach us at: Contact Email: nursing-science@magnusconference.com Phone: +1 (702) 988-2320 WhatsApp: +1 (434) 264 7183 Dates: August 21 -23, 2023 Venue: London, UK Website: https://internationalnursingconference.com/ Abstract submission: https://internationalnursingconference.com/submit-abstract Registration: https://internationalnursingconference.com/register Social Media Link: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NursingScienceConf Twitter: https://twitter.com/nursingscience2 YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLtH0EIiRfFWaIOwuYL5IEw Organiser: Magnus Group LLC - https://www.magnusgroup.org/ Conference Manager: Sophie White Organiser Address: Magnus Group LLC 150 South Wacker Drive #2400 Chicago, IL 60606, USA
